nodes.id: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1946年至1952年在台湾成立的省级地下工作机构。
description.en: A provincial-level underground organization established by the Communist Party of China in Taiwan from 1946 to 1952.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会首任书记，原台湾共产党党员。1950年被捕后变节。
description.en: The first secretary of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China and a former member of the Taiwanese Communist Party. He defected after being arrested in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会后期领导人，1950年接任书记，1952年被捕。
description.en: A later leader of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China, who took over as secretary in 1950 and was arrested in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会副书记兼武工部长，1950年被捕，1954年被枪决。
description.en: Deputy secretary and head of the armed work department of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China. He was arrested in 1950 and executed in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会常委兼宣传部长。
description.en: A standing committee member and propaganda minister of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，指示在台湾建立省工作委员会。
description.en: The ruling party of China, which directed the establishment of the Provincial Work Committee in Taiwan.

en: East China Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会的上级机构。
description.en: The superior body of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建者及1949年后的台湾执政党，负责瓦解中共台湾省工委。
description.en: The founder of the Republic of China and the ruling party of Taiwan after 1949, responsible for dismantling the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 台湾日治时期存在的共产主义政党，与战后的中共台湾省工委并无继承关系。
description.en: A communist party that existed during the Japanese rule of Taiwan, with no inheritance relationship to the post-war Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 1947年台湾发生的反政府暴动，中共台湾省工委部分成员参与了事件中的武装反抗。
description.en: An anti-government uprising in Taiwan in 1947, in which some members of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee participated in armed resistance.

description.zh-cn: 在二二八事件中于嘉南地区成立，反抗陈仪政府的武装力量。
description.en: An armed force established in the Chianan area during the February 28 incident to resist the government of Chen Yi.

description.zh-cn: 中共台湾省工委成员，曾参与二二八事件中的台湾自治联军。
description.en: A member of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee who participated in the Taiwan Self-Government Allied Army during the February 28 incident.

description.zh-cn: 二二八事件时任台湾省行政长官。
description.en: The Governor of Taiwan Province at the time of the February 28 incident.

description.zh-cn: 中共台湾省工委在台北市发行的机关报，其被破获是导致省工委组织瓦解的关键事件之一。
description.en: The official newspaper published by the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee in Taipei. Its discovery was a key event leading to the collapse of the committee's organization.

description.zh-cn: 发生于朝鲜半岛的战争。其爆发导致美国海军开进台湾海峡，迫使中国人民解放军放弃进攻台湾的计划。
description.en: A war that took place on the Korean Peninsula. Its outbreak led to the U.S. Navy entering the Taiwan Strait, forcing the People's Liberation Army to abandon its plan to attack Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 美国的海上军事力量，在朝鲜战争爆发后进入台湾海峡。
description.en: The maritime branch of the United States Armed Forces, which entered the Taiwan Strait after the outbreak of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。曾计划进攻台湾，但因朝鲜战争爆发而被迫放弃。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China. It had planned to attack Taiwan but was forced to abandon the plan due to the outbreak of the Korean War.

en: Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1949年后退守台湾的中华民国执政当局，负责侦破并瓦解了中共台湾省工委的组织。
description.en: The ruling authority of the Republic of China that retreated to Taiwan after 1949, responsible for investigating and dismantling the organization of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee.

nodes.id: 中华民国国防部保密局

zh-cn: 中华民国国防部保密局

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的情报机构，蔡孝干变节后在此任职。
description.en: An intelligence agency of the Republic of China, where Cai Xiaogan worked after his defection.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾多次到狱中探望并劝降张志忠。
description.en: A political figure of the Republic of China who visited Zhang Zhizhong in prison multiple times to persuade him to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 中共台湾省工委高雄市工委会书记，1949年被捕。
description.en: Secretary of the Kaohsiung City Work Committee of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee, arrested in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1945年9月，中国共产党命令党员蔡孝干返回台湾成立组织。
description.en: In September 1945, the Communist Party of China ordered party member Cai Xiaogan to return to Taiwan to establish an organization.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 1946年8月，蔡孝干返台后召集会议，成立了中国共产党台湾省工作委员会。
description.en: In August 1946, after returning to Taiwan, Cai Xiaogan convened a meeting and established the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，中国共产党台湾省工作委员会是中共中央华东局的下级机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China was a subordinate body of the East China Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 蔡孝干担任中国共产党台湾省工作委员会的首任书记。
description.en: Cai Xiaogan served as the first secretary of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈福星在蔡孝干被捕后接任中国共产党台湾省工作委员会书记。
description.en: Chen Fuxing took over as secretary of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China after Cai Xiaogan was arrested.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

position.en: Deputy Secretary, Standing Committee Member, Head of Armed Work Department

description.zh-cn: 张志忠担任中国共产党台湾省工作委员会副书记、常委及武工部长。
description.en: Zhang Zhizhong served as Deputy Secretary, Standing Committee Member, and Head of the Armed Work Department of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 金尧如于1947年加入，担任中国共产党台湾省工作委员会常委兼宣传部长。
description.en: Jin Yaoru joined in 1947 and served as a Standing Committee Member and Propaganda Minister of the Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为中共在台组织，与执政的国民党处于敌对状态，并最终被其瓦解。
description.en: As a CPC organization in Taiwan, it was in a hostile state with the ruling Kuomintang and was eventually dismantled by it.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 1952年，中国国民党瓦解了中共台湾省工委在台的领导机构。
description.en: In 1952, the Kuomintang dismantled the leadership structure of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 二二八事件期间，在嘉南地区成立了反抗政府的台湾自治联军。
description.en: During the February 28 Incident, the Taiwan Self-Government Allied Army was formed in the Chianan area to resist the government.

description.zh-cn: 台湾自治联军是在二二八事件中为反抗陈仪政府而成立的武装力量。
description.en: The Taiwan Self-Government Allied Army was an armed force established to resist the government of Chen Yi during the February 28 incident.

description.zh-cn: 张志忠是参与二二八事件中台湾自治联军的中共台湾省工委成员之一。
description.en: Zhang Zhizhong was one of the members of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee who participated in the Taiwan Self-Government Allied Army during the February 28 incident.

description.zh-cn: 李妈兜是参与二二八事件中台湾自治联军的中共台湾省工委成员之一。
description.en: Li Madou was one of the members of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee who participated in the Taiwan Self-Government Allied Army during the February 28 incident.

relationships.source: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会在台北市发行《光明报》作为其机关报。
description.en: The Taiwan Provincial Work Committee of the Communist Party of China published the "Guangming Daily" in Taipei as its official newspaper.

description.zh-cn: 1949年8月，中华民国政府破获了中共台湾省工委发行的《光明报》。
description.en: In August 1949, the government of the Republic of China uncovered the "Guangming Daily" published by the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的爆发迫使中国人民解放军放弃跨海进攻台湾的计划。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War forced the People's Liberation Army to abandon its plan to attack Taiwan across the sea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争爆发后，美国海军开进台湾海峡，阻止了解放军进攻台湾。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Korean War, the U.S. Navy entered the Taiwan Strait, preventing the People's Liberation Army from attacking Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月，中共台湾省工委书记蔡孝干被捕。
description.en: In March 1950, Cai Xiaogan, secretary of the CPC Taiwan Provincial Work Committee, was arrested.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台湾省工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 蔡孝干被捕后变节，并供出中共在台人员，导致千余人遭到株连，严重打击了省工委组织。
description.en: After his arrest, Cai Xiaogan defected and exposed CPC personnel in Taiwan, implicating over a thousand people and severely damaging the Provincial Work Committee's organization.

relationships.target: 中华民国国防部保密局

description.zh-cn: 蔡孝干变节后，加入国民党，担任中华民国国防部保密局设计委员会委员。
description.en: After his defection, Cai Xiaogan joined the Kuomintang and served as a member of the Design Committee of the Bureau of Confidentiality, Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张志忠于1950年5月被捕，并于1954年3月遭到枪决。
description.en: Zhang Zhizhong was arrested in May 1950 and executed by firing squad in March 1954.

description.zh-cn: 张志忠被捕后，蒋经国多次到狱中探望并试图劝降，但遭到拒绝。
description.en: After Zhang Zhizhong's arrest, Chiang Ching-kuo visited him in prison multiple times to persuade him to surrender, but was refused.
